hero.title: CLUSTERS OF MULTI-ORGANIZATIONS FOR SUPPORT & SERVICES
hero.description: Empowering industries with next-gen AI SaaS solutions through scalable platforms, innovation, and support.

about.title: About CLUMOSS
description: CLUMOSS is India's leading technology conglomerate specializing in advanced artificial intelligence solutions. We architect and deploy comprehensive AI ecosystems that transform how businesses operate, innovate, and scale in the digital economy.

Our expertise spans the full spectrum of intelligent technologies—from machine learning and deep learning frameworks to cutting-edge generative AI, voice recognition systems, and autonomous agent orchestration. We combine these capabilities with enterprise-grade security and cloud-native architecture to deliver solutions that are both powerful and practical.

subsidiaries.name: MistrAI
subsidiaries.description: Our product development arm focuses on creating sophisticated SaaS platforms and AI-powered applications. MistrAI transforms complex business challenges into intuitive, scalable solutions that drive measurable results across industries.

subsidiaries.name: NeuroForgeAI
subsidiaries.description: Dedicated to physical AI implementation, NeuroForgeAI develops the intelligent backbone for robotics, autonomous systems, and IoT ecosystems. We engineer the cognitive infrastructure that brings intelligence to the physical world.
subsidiaries.slogan: We deliver what Physical AI needs

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.description: Every project at CLUMOSS begins with understanding your unique challenges and objectives. We design custom AI solutions that integrate seamlessly with your existing infrastructure while ensuring scalability, reliability, and profitability. Our cloud-native approach guarantees that your solutions grow with your business, backed by robust security frameworks and continuous optimization.

about.closing: From concept to deployment, CLUMOSS delivers intelligent solutions that don't just meet today's requirements—they anticipate tomorrow's opportunities.

generalInformation.title: General Information
generalInformation.content: The information provided by CLUMOSS and its subsidiaries (MistrAI and NeuroForgeAI) on this website and through our services is for general informational and educational purposes only. All content is provided in good faith, however, we make no representation or warranty of any kind, express or implied, regarding the accuracy, adequacy, validity, reliability, availability, or completeness of any information on the site or our services.

professionalServices.title: Professional Services
content: Our AI, machine learning, and technology solutions are provided based on current industry standards and best practices. However, technology evolves rapidly, and outcomes may vary depending on implementation, usage, and environmental factors. CLUMOSS does not guarantee specific results or performance metrics from our solutions.
Clients are advised to conduct their own due diligence and consult with qualified professionals before making business decisions based on our recommendations or implementations.

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
content: Under no circumstance shall CLUMOSS, MistrAI, NeuroForgeAI, or their directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates be liable for any indirect, incidental, punitive, special, or consequential damages, including but not limited to loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from your use of our services or website.
Our total liability for any claims arising from or related to our services shall not exceed the amount paid by the client for the specific service in question.

aiSystemsAndDataProcessing.title: AI Systems and Data Processing
content: Our AI and machine learning systems are designed to provide intelligent solutions based on available data and algorithms. However, AI systems may produce unexpected results, and we cannot guarantee 100% accuracy in all scenarios. Users should implement appropriate validation and oversight mechanisms when deploying AI solutions in production environments.
Data processing results and AI-generated insights should be reviewed by qualified personnel before making critical business decisions.

thirdPartyIntegration.title: Third-Party Integration
content: Our solutions may integrate with third-party services, APIs, or platforms. CLUMOSS is not responsible for the availability, accuracy, or reliability of third-party services. Changes to third-party systems may affect the functionality of our solutions.
We recommend maintaining backup systems and contingency plans when relying on integrated solutions.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All proprietary technologies, methodologies, and intellectual property developed by CLUMOSS remain our exclusive property. Client-specific customizations and data remain the property of the respective clients, subject to our service agreements.

regulatoryCompliance.title: Regulatory Compliance
content: While we strive to ensure our solutions comply with applicable regulations and industry standards, clients are responsible for ensuring that their use of our services complies with all relevant laws, regulations, and industry requirements in their jurisdiction.
Regulatory requirements may change, and clients should regularly review compliance requirements for their specific use cases.

updatesAndModifications.title: Updates and Modifications
updatesAndModifications.content: CLUMOSS reserves the right to update, modify, or discontinue any aspect of our services or this disclaimer at any time without prior notice. Continued use of our services after such changes constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

contactInformation.title: Contact Information
contactInformation.content: For questions regarding this disclaimer or our services, please contact our legal and compliance team through our official communication channels. All formal notices should be submitted in writing through our designated contact procedures.

lastUpdated.content: CLUMOSS - India’s Leading AI Technology Conglomerate

ourCommitmentToPrivacy.title: Our Commitment to Privacy
content: At CLUMOSS and its subsidiaries (MistrAI and NeuroForgeAI), we value and respect your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when you engage with our services, products, websites, and applications.
Our practices are aligned with international data protection regulations, including the GDPR (Europe), CCPA (California), and other global privacy standards.

personalData.title: Personal Data
personalData.content: Name, email address, phone number, billing information, or other identifiers provided when registering or using our services.

usageData.title: Usage Data
usageData.content: Device information, IP addresses, browser type, access times, and pages viewed to improve our services and ensure security.

aiInteractionData.title: AI Interaction Data
aiInteractionData.content: Prompts, inputs, and outputs generated through our AI and LLM-powered services. This data is collected only to improve quality and ensure compliance with our service standards.

howWeUseYourInformation.title: How We Use Your Information
content: We use the collected data to deliver exceptional AI-driven solutions and maintain the highest standards of service. Specifically, we use your information for:

list: Delivering and improving our AI-driven services and solutions
Personalizing user experiences and optimizing system performance
Ensuring system security, fraud prevention, and compliance with applicable laws
Providing customer support and service updates
Conducting research and development to enhance our AI capabilities

dataSharingAndDisclosure.title: Data Sharing & Disclosure
content: We do not sell or rent your personal data to third parties. Your privacy is paramount to our business operations and ethical standards.
Data may be shared with trusted service providers, strictly for operational, security, or compliance purposes under contractual obligations to protect your information.
AI models may process your inputs to provide services, but data is not shared for advertising or unrelated commercial activities without explicit consent.

dataSecurityMeasures.title: Data Security Measures
content: We implement industry-standard encryption, access controls, and continuous monitoring to safeguard your information. Our security infrastructure includes advanced threat detection, regular security audits, and compliance with international security frameworks.

While we employ comprehensive security measures to protect your data, no system is completely immune to risks. We continuously update our security protocols to address emerging threats and maintain the highest level of data protection.

internationalDataTransfers.title: International Data Transfers
content: Your data may be processed and stored in regions outside your country of residence to provide our global AI services. We ensure all international transfers comply with GDPR, CCPA, and other applicable regulations.
Appropriate safeguards, including standard contractual clauses and adequacy decisions, are implemented to protect your data during international transfers.

yourPrivacyRights.title: Your Privacy Rights
content: Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have comprehensive rights regarding your personal data:

list: Access Rights: Request access to and copies of your personal data
Correction Rights: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
Deletion Rights: Request deletion of your personal data under certain circumstances
Processing Restrictions: Object to or restrict certain data processing activities
Data Portability: Request transfer of your data in a machine-readable format
Consent Withdrawal: Withdraw consent for data processing at any time

cookiesAndTrackingTechnologies.title: Cookies & Tracking Technologies
content: Our website and services use cookies and similar technologies to enhance functionality, improve performance, and personalize content. These technologies help us understand user behavior and optimize our AI solutions.
You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings. However, disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of our services.

aiAndMachineLearningDataProcessing.title: AI and Machine Learning Data Processing
content: Our AI systems process data to provide intelligent solutions, predictive analytics, and automated decision-making capabilities. We implement privacy-by-design principles in our AI development processes.
Data used for training and improving our AI models is anonymized and aggregated where possible. Individual user data is protected through advanced privacy-preserving techniques.

policyUpdatesAndChanges.title: Policy Updates and Changes
content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices, technology, legal requirements, or business operations. Material changes will be communicated through appropriate channels.
Continued use of our services after policy updates constitutes acceptance of the revised terms. We encourage regular review of this policy to stay informed about our privacy practices.

contactInformation.title: Contact Information
content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, wish to exercise your data rights, or need assistance with privacy-related matters, please contact our dedicated privacy team.

For formal privacy requests or concerns, please use our official communication channels. We are committed to responding promptly and addressing all privacy-related inquiries with the utmost care and attention.

regulatoryCompliance.title: Regulatory Compliance
regulatoryCompliance.content: CLUMOSS maintains compliance with international privacy regulations including GDPR (EU), CCPA (California), PIPEDA (Canada), and applicable Indian data protection laws. Our privacy practices are regularly audited and updated to meet evolving regulatory requirements.

lastUpdated.content: CLUMOSS - India’s Leading AI Technology Conglomerate

whatIsClumoss.question: What is CLUMOSS?
whatIsClumoss.text: CLUMOSS is a hybrid AI company that builds advanced Generative AI SaaS products, automation workflows, platforms, and intelligent business solutions. It serves as the parent entity to MistrAI and NeuroForgeAI, two specialized subsidiaries operating in digital and physical AI domains. Together, they form a complete AI ecosystem focused on innovation, scalability, and real-world impact.

followUps.text: What is the full form of CLUMOSS?

fullFormClumoss.question: What is Full Form of CLUMOSS?
fullFormClumoss.text:
The full form of CLUMOSS is “Cluster of Multi Organizations for Support & Services.”

It represents a unified ecosystem of multiple specialized entities working together to deliver cutting-edge AI products, enterprise solutions, and automation services — all operating under one powerful umbrella to ensure innovation, efficiency, and excellence across industries.

whoFoundedClumoss.question: Who founded CLUMOSS, Who is the founder/owner of CLUMOSS
whoFoundedClumoss.text: CLUMOSS was founded by Karan Bhatt, an Indian tech entrepreneur and EDM music producer. He is currently holding the complete ownership of CLUMOSS and it subsidiaries MistrAI(link) and NeuroForgeAI(Link).

solutions.question: What solutions does CLUMOSS provide? What kind of soulutions do you provide? What services does CLUMOSS offer
solutions.text:
CLUMOSS provides a comprehensive suite of AI-driven solutions tailored to address diverse business challenges across industries. Here’s an organized overview of our key offerings:

Core AI Solutions:

1) Agentic AI
2) Data Analytics & Machine Learning
3) Workflow Automation
4) Full-Stack Generative AI Development
5) MCP-Powered AI Agents & Orchestration
6) Next-Gen UI/UX Design
7) Fine-Tuned LLM Solutions
8) Data Protection & Security
9) Enterprise Web Development
10) Conversational Voice Agents

hasSubsidiaries.question: Does CLUMOSS have its subsidiaries?
hasSubsidiaries.text:
Yes, CLUMOSS has two key subsidiaries — MistrAI and NeuroForgeAI.

MistrAI: Focuses on Full-Stack Generative AI SaaS products, platforms, and workflow automation tools that are secure, subscription-based, and customizable as per client requirements.

NeuroForgeAI: Specializes in Physical AI, developing backend logic, neural frameworks, and intelligent prototypes that allow machines to sense, understand, and interact with their surroundings.

Together, they operate under the CLUMOSS ecosystem, driving innovation across digital and physical AI domains.

whatAreSubsidiaries.question: What are CLUMOSS subsidiaries?
whatAreSubsidiaries.text:
CLUMOSS operates through its two powerful subsidiaries — MistrAI and NeuroForgeAI — each driving a distinct frontier of artificial intelligence under the unified CLUMOSS ecosystem.

MistrAI: Develops Full-Stack Generative AI SaaS products, platforms, and workflow automation tools that are secure, subscription-based, and fully customizable to client needs.

NeuroForgeAI: Builds backend logic, neural frameworks, and prototypes for Physical AI systems, enabling machines to sense, understand, and interact with the external environment.

Together, they represent the innovation core of CLUMOSS — where digital intelligence meets physical automation, shaping the future of AI-driven transformation.

whatIsMistrAI.question: What is MistrAI
whatIsMistrAI.text: MistrAI is the primary subsidiary of CLUMOSS, specializing in Generative AI and SaaS product development. It builds subscription-based AI platforms that are secure, customizable, and ready to deploy. As the core innovation arm of CLUMOSS, MistrAI delivers end-to-end AI solutions that automate business operations, reduce costs, and drive smarter, data-powered decision-making.

howMistrAIWorks.question: How MistrAI works
howMistrAIWorks.text:
MistrAI develops its own subscription-based AI SaaS products, workflow automations and platforms that are secure, scalable, and customizable. These products are designed to be either ready-to-use or tailored to meet specific client requirements.

When clients need additional customization, the MistrAI team adapts and enhances the product to align perfectly with their goals. For complex or large-scale modifications that go beyond MistrAI’s operational scope, the project is escalated to CLUMOSS for strategic execution and delivery.

isMistrAIProductOrService.question: Is MistrAI product or service based?
isMistrAIProductOrService.text:
MistrAI is primarily a product-based company that also offers customization services.

It develops proprietary, subscription-based AI SaaS products and platforms that are secure, scalable, and ready to use. However, when clients need customized solutions or integrations, MistrAI extends its service arm to tailor those products to specific business requirements.

Conclusion: MistrAI is a hybrid company, but its core identity is product-based.

followUps.text: What kind of company is CLUMOSS?

whatIsNeuroForgeAI.question: What is NeuroForgeAI
whatIsNeuroForgeAI.text: NeuroForgeAI is a subsidiary of CLUMOSS focused on developing the backend intelligence for Physical AI systems. It builds the core logic, neural frameworks, and adaptive control mechanisms that allow machines to sense, interact, and act autonomously. NeuroForgeAI showcases its innovations through functional prototypes and demos, enabling companies to experience real-world AI integration. Its motto — “We deliver what Physical AI needs” — defines its mission to power the brains behind intelligent robotics and automation.

howNeuroForgeAIWorks.question: How NeuroForgeAI works
howNeuroForgeAIWorks.text:
NeuroForgeAI powers the backend intelligence of Physical AI systems — essentially serving as the brain that drives real-world machines. It develops the core logic, neural control, and decision-making systems that enable a physical body or device to sense, detect, interact, and respond to its surroundings with precision and autonomy.

Motto: “We deliver what Physical AI needs.”

isNeuroForgeAIProductOrService.question: Is NeuroForgeAI product or service based?
isNeuroForgeAIProductOrService.text:
NeuroForgeAI is a hybrid company, combining both product development and service delivery in the physical AI domain.

It primarily focuses on developing backend logic and neural frameworks that act as the brain for physical AI systems — enabling machines to sense, interact, and respond intelligently to their environment.
NeuroForgeAI showcases its innovations through prototypes, which companies can use or integrate into their own systems.

Conclusion: NeuroForgeAI delivers both ready-to-adapt prototypes (product) and custom AI logic integration (service) — making it a complete hybrid in the field of intelligent physical automation.

howClumossWorks.question: How CLUMOSS woks? How does CLUMOSS manage client requirements and project execution?
howClumossWorks.text:
All new or direct client requirements are managed and delivered by CLUMOSS, which oversees every project from strategy to execution with complete authority.

If a client approaches through MistrAI for an existing product or customization, the MistrAI team handles it. For advanced or out-of-scope requirements, the project is escalated to CLUMOSS for strategic execution. The same applies to NeuroForgeAI — it manages its own physical AI and robotics solutions unless the request demands broader integration or higher complexity, in which case CLUMOSS takes charge.

In all cases, CLUMOSS retains the ultimate authority to evaluate, direct, and assign any project to MistrAI or NeuroForgeAI, ensuring excellence, precision, and seamless delivery across its ecosystem.

followUps.text: What kind of company is CLUMOSS?

clumossCompanyType.question: What kind of company is CLUMOSS — product-based or service-based?
clumossCompanyType.text:
Hybrid Company:
CLUMOSS is a hybrid AI and technology company, operating as both product-based and service-based. It unites innovation and execution by building intelligent AI products while delivering complete, customized technology solutions to clients worldwide.

Product-Based:
Through its subsidiaries — MistrAI and NeuroForgeAI — CLUMOSS develops Full Stack Generative AI SaaS products, workflow automation platforms, and physical AI systems. All products are subscription-based, scalable, and customizable as per business needs.

Service-Based:
Under the CLUMOSS brand, it offers end-to-end AI and enterprise software solutions, handling everything from requirement analysis and design to full-stack development, automation, and deployment.

Conclusion:
CLUMOSS is a next-generation hybrid AI company, combining product innovation with custom solution delivery, and holds the final authority to assign projects to its subsidiaries — MistrAI or NeuroForgeAI — based on project requirements and domain fit.

helpStartupsInvestors.question: Does CLUMOSS help startups and investors?
helpStartupsInvestors.text:
Yes — CLUMOSS empowers startups, founders, and investors by providing access to its AI infrastructure and automation frameworks.
Startups gain faster product development, reduced costs, and higher scalability, while investors benefit from long-term growth, predictable returns, and entry into expanding AI markets.

CLUMOSS bridges the gap between innovation and investment success.

welcomeToClumoss.title: Welcome to CLUMOSS
content: By accessing, browsing, or using our website, products, and services provided by CLUMOSS and its subsidiaries (MistrAI and NeuroForgeAI), you agree to be bound by the following Terms and Conditions.
Please read them carefully. If you do not agree with these terms, kindly discontinue use of our services immediately.

useOfServices.title: 1. Use of Services
content: You agree to use our AI-powered services, machine learning solutions, and technology platforms only for lawful purposes and in compliance with all applicable international, federal, state, and local laws.

list: Unauthorized use of our services, including but not limited to hacking, reverse engineering, or misusing data is strictly prohibited
You may not exploit or misuse our intellectual property, trademarks, or proprietary AI algorithms without prior written consent
Commercial use of our services must comply with the specific terms outlined in your service agreement

intellectualPropertyRights.title: 2. Intellectual Property Rights
content: All content, software, AI models, algorithms, trademarks, and materials provided on our platform are owned by CLUMOSS, its subsidiaries, or licensed third-party providers.
You are granted a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the services for personal or authorized business use, subject to these Terms and any additional service agreements.
Our proprietary AI technologies, machine learning models, and data processing methodologies remain the exclusive intellectual property of CLUMOSS.

userResponsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities
content: As a user of CLUMOSS services, you bear certain responsibilities to ensure proper and lawful use of our AI solutions:

list: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality and security of your account credentials
Any activities performed under your account will be considered your responsibility
You must not upload or distribute harmful content, including malware, offensive material, or copyrighted works without proper authorization
You agree to use our AI services responsibly and ethically, avoiding any applications that could cause harm or violate applicable laws
You must comply with data protection regulations when processing personal or sensitive data through our services

privacyAndDataProtection.title: 4. Privacy & Data Protection
content: Your privacy and data security are fundamental to our operations. We handle your data in accordance with our comprehensive Privacy Policy and applicable data protection regulations.
By using our services, you consent to the collection, processing, and storage of your information as outlined in our Privacy Policy, which complies with GDPR, CCPA, and other relevant privacy laws.
We implement advanced security measures and privacy-by-design principles in all our AI solutions to protect your data throughout the processing lifecycle.

limitationOfLiability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
content: We make every effort to ensure accuracy, reliability, and availability of our AI services and technology solutions, but we do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free operation.
CLUMOSS, MistrAI, NeuroForgeAI, and their affiliates will not be held liable for direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising from the use of our services.
Our total liability for any claims shall not exceed the amount paid by you for the specific service in question during the preceding twelve months.

thirdPartyServicesAndIntegrations.title: 6. Third-Party Services & Integrations
content: Our AI solutions may integrate with or contain links to third-party websites, APIs, cloud services, or external platforms to enhance functionality and provide comprehensive solutions.

We are not responsible for the content, policies, practices, availability, or security of such external platforms. Your interactions with third-party services are governed by their respective terms and conditions.
We recommend reviewing the terms and privacy policies of any third-party services you access through our platform.

serviceAvailabilityAndPerformance.title: 7. Service Availability & Performance
content: While we strive to maintain high availability and performance standards for our AI services, we do not guarantee 100% uptime or specific performance metrics unless explicitly stated in your service level agreement.

Scheduled maintenance, updates, and unforeseen technical issues may temporarily affect service availability. We will make reasonable efforts to minimize disruptions and provide advance notice when possible.

termination.title: 8. Termination
content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate access to our services at any time, with or without prior notice, if these Terms are violated or if we determine that continued service provision is not feasible.
Upon termination, your access to our services will cease, and you must discontinue all use of our proprietary technologies and return or delete any confidential information in your possession.

governingLawAndJurisdiction.title: 9. Governing Law & Jurisdiction
content: These Terms will be governed and interpreted in accordance with the laws of India and applicable international regulations governing AI and technology services.

Any disputes arising from these Terms or the use of our services shall be resolved under the exclusive jurisdiction of courts located in India, specifically in the jurisdiction where CLUMOSS maintains its principal operations.

changesToTerms.title: 10. Changes to Terms
content: We reserve the right to update, modify, or revise these Terms & Conditions at any time to reflect changes in our services, legal requirements, or business practices.
Continued use of our services after changes are made signifies your acceptance of the updated Terms. We will provide reasonable notice of material changes through appropriate communication channels.

contactUs.title: 11. Contact Us
content: If you have any questions regarding these Terms & Conditions, need clarification about our services, or require legal assistance, please contact our legal and compliance team.
For formal legal notices or contract-related inquiries, please use our official communication channels. We are committed to addressing all inquiries promptly and professionally.

lastUpdated.content: CLUMOSS - India’s Leading AI Technology Conglomerate
